syzygryd
Class Button

java.lang.Object
  syzygryd.Button
Direct Known Subclasses:
ToggleButton
public abstract class Button
extends java.lang.Object

The Button class encapsulates the state of a single Syzygryd button on a tab.

Author:
Daniel C. Silverstein

getOscRow

public int getOscRow()
getOscRow handles the fact that OSC is indexed from 1 not 0, and has an inverted y-axis vs. processing.

Returns:
this button's row for use in an OSC address

getOscCol

public int getOscCol()
getOscCol Handles the fact that OSC is indexed from 1 not 0.

Returns:
this button's column for use in an OSC address
